Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We will now begin the <RED>Foliage Festival</RED>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's enjoy the view of the red foliage
in the forest and then gather some
fallen leaves for the bonfire. Let's go!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I picked up enough fallen leaves, so
let's go back. Right this way, everyone!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Let's pick up the fallen
leaves together. Now let's go!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Pick up fallen leaves? What if I hurt
my precious fingers? As a stylist, this
will affect my livelihood.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Well, you heard me, <MYNAME>. Pick up
my share of leaves, too.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>What? You look unhappy. Oh, fine. I'll
treat you to a nice dinner. How's that?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You heard him, <MYNAME>. Let's make
our way back.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I had a great time today, <MYNAME>.
Let's come again next year.
<PAGE>
You can pick up leaves for me again
then. I'll be counting on you.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Let's go pick up the
leaves together. Come on, let's go.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Say, how about we go digging for sweet
potatoes while we go picking up leaves?
<PAGE>
Oh, right! If I helped out at your
ranch, I'd get to try out digging for
sweet potatoes! Right, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Can I have a sleepover
at your place? We could chat until
morning with a sweet potato in hand.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, Dunhill is calling for us. Let's
go back, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hmm! I had so much fun today! Let's
come again next year, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh hi, <MYNAME>. Do you want to pick
up fallen leaves together?
<PAGE>
Let's have some fun with just the guys,
you know. Well, let's go.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ow... Picking up fallen leaves really
hurts my back. I think I might twist
something.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Hm? What's that? You're saying it's
hard because I'm old? And that you're
okay because you're young?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>Gah! I'm going to punish you good for
that, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
Eat this! Fallen leaves ninja stars!
Hahahahahaha! How do you like them
apples?!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? Right when we were starting to
have some fun. Oh, well. Let's go back.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow... Nothing beats a baked sweet
potato after a good workout.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, we should come again next
year to pick up leaves again. I'll be
looking forward to it.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, would you like to gather
fallen leaves together?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Using fallen leaves to bake sweet
potatoes is a custom unfamiliar to my
country. Thus, I want to participate.
<PAGE>
However, in my country, we have
ceremonies with steamed vegetables or
fish wrapped in leaves and steamed.
<PAGE>
If you are interested, I will prepare
a dish like that for you. Please come to
visit if it pleases you.
<PAGE>
I will be waiting, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let us return, <MYNAME>. I cannot wait
to taste the baked sweet potatoes.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I am glad to be able to speak with you
today, <MYNAME>. I would very much like
to do this again with you next year.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Let's go pick up those
leaves together.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Man, I'm tired. I was up late last night
so my head isn't working right.
<PAGE>
Hey, <MYNAME>... Do you think you could
sleep on a bed of leaves? Maybe I should
give it a try right now.
<PAGE>
What? No fair because I'm hogging it?
I didn't say you couldn't lay down too.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Well, now we're accomplices. Let's just
play hooky for a bit and take a break.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What? We have to go back already? Oh,
fine. Let's go.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Too bad, <MYNAME>. You didn't get to
sleep on the bed of leaves.
<PAGE>
Well, we have this festival every year.
Better luck next time.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi, <MYNAME>. Would you like to go pick
up fallen leaves together?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Don't you think the
pattern on this leaf resembles your
face?
<PAGE>
See? You and it are identical.
Coincidences like this really do happen.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>We should take this leaf back to the
mansion and hang in the hallway. I'll
call it "<MYNAME>, the builder."
<PAGE>
Haha. Don't get so mad. I was only
joking.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It seems like it's time. Shall we go,
<MYNAME>?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I had a lot of fun today. Thank you,
<MYNAME>. I hope we can come again
together next year.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Let's go pick up those
leaves! C'mon! Let's go!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
You know what, <MYNAME>? Do you want
half of my sweet potato today?
<PAGE>
I'm starting to worry about my waistline
so I was thinking of going on a diet.
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>What? You were thinking the same thing?
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Hahahaha! We're so similar! Birds of
a feather, right?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You heard him! Well, let's go, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It was so fun today. Let's come again
next year, <MYNAME>. And we'll split
the sweet potato then!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. If you'd like, let's go pick
up the leaves together. I want to have
a little chat with you.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Say, <MYNAME>. This might be sudden,
but I want to hear any stories about
your love life.<MYNAME><RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
Oh. When that's your reaction, I want
to hear it even more now!
<PAGE>
There's no one around anyway. Come on.
In exchange, I'll tell you mine.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Aww, that's too bad. We'll continue 
this the next time we're together.
I'll be looking forward to it.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Haha. I had so much fun today, <MYNAME>.
Let's come again next year to collect
leaves again.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>... Let's go gather the leaves
together...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>... The leaves are red and
pretty... This is fun...
<PAGE>
By the way, the outfit I'm making right
now also uses this color...
<PAGE>
I thought you would look good in it, so
I hope you'll come visit to try it on,
<MYNAME>...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's go back... I'm looking forward to
the baked sweet potatoes...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you for today... We should come
together again next year...

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, would you like to go and
pick up fallen leaves together? I would
also like to have a talk with you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The foliage is beautiful. The autumnal
leaves in my hometown are also quite a
sight to see.
<PAGE>
Oh, yes. We have events where we enjoy
the red leaves under the moon while
listening to kotos and flutes.
<PAGE>
If you would like, you can come visit
my hometown. I'm sure you will enjoy it.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Shall we return? Gathering these leaves
has made me quite hungry. I'm sure the
sweet potatoes will be very delicious.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm glad to be able to have gone with
you, <MYNAME>. I had a wonderful time.
<PAGE>
I would be nice if we could come
together next year as well. I will be
looking forward to it.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, would like to collect
fallen leaves together? It's a good
chance for us to relax together!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I can't wait to try the sweet potatoes!
But don't you want to try out other
kinds of food, too?
<PAGE>
There's fish, mushrooms, marshmallows...
Oh, roasted apples sound good, too!
<PAGE>
Don't you think so, <MYNAME>? We should
have a bonfire party next time! I'll be
looking forward to it<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, Dunhill is calling. We should
return, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I had so much fun today! We should
gather leaves again together next year!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. We're here anyway, so let's go
together.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
These people aren't surprised to see
the Witch Princess taking part in their
little festival? Weirdoes.
<PAGE>
I think you're a prime example of that,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Oh, I didn't mean that in a bad way. I
like how carefree you are, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I'm grateful how you built my home
for me. Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come, <MYNAME>. It's time for that
sweet potato baking you've been waiting
for. Let's go.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I had some fun, so maybe I should come
again next year.
<PAGE>
Well, you heard me, <MYNAME>. Let's do
it again next year.
